introduction: Costrict is an open-source, strict AI Coder for enterprises. It can be deployed privately, prioritizes controllable results and top-tier quality, and delivers three core capabilities â€” AI Agent, AI Code Review, and AI Completion. Log in to give it a try.

telemetry.title: Help Improve Costrict
telemetry.anonymousTelemetry: Send anonymous error and usage data to help us fix bugs and improve the extension. No code, prompts, or personal information is ever sent (unless you connect to Costrict). See our <privacyLink>privacy policy</privacyLink> for more details.

chooseProvider: To do its magic, Costrict needs an API key.

vibe.description: Conversational coding approach. Discuss requirements and build iteratively.
vibe.incentive:
Ideal for:

Quick prototyping and experimentation
Projects with evolving requirements
Task-oriented development

strict.description: Structured development methodology. Plan thoroughly before implementation.
strict.incentive:
Best suited for:

Complex feature development
Enterprise-grade applications
Projects requiring detailed architecture
